data.text: I changed from @EE to @TheO2 as frankly was about ¬£15 cheaper a month: I now know why. I live in Bham, hardly the sticks, but I've never any signal, get 3G mostly and yet to see a 5g so far. Not really fit for purpose currently üôÑ don't do it.
@TootinandBeepin @O2 @EE What. WHAT.
@EE Hi, I live in the East Lindsay area and for the past hour have had no signal at all. I am unable to make or receive calls or texts. Any help would be much appreciated. üòÅ
@EE Prices going up mid-contract coz other providers do it? Surely you'd get more more customers if you didnt do that. I'm looking at Tesco Mobile. They DON'T do it.
@EE why are you allowing fraudulent activity from @PlayStation on our accounts? This is unacceptable!!
@helloimnicholas @O2 @EE U going series 7? I won one on a raffle! https://t.co/MqAAYZ8Hjs
@AIDANTURNER4 @mattfrei @EE @kevinbacon As I just wrote to Matt, Three kept talking about ‚Äòour protocols‚Äô ; translated means devices and constraints to rob customers.
@mattfrei @EE @kevinbacon Have a word with your colleague @deandunham üëçüëç

@mattfrei @86Shyguy @EE @kevinbacon Cancel the DDs seems to appropriate more helpful response. The whole industry is programmed by what they call ‚Äòour protocols‚Äô by which they mean devices to con customers.
@mattfrei @EE @kevinbacon Isn‚Äôt it because Bernie made off with all his money ?
@mattfrei @EE @kevinbacon yeah‚Ä¶ but it rhymes.
@EE But then EE have reintroduced roaming charges which is a disgrace.
@helloimnicholas @O2 @EE Yep I can recommend @EE as well, nice customer service
I need @Apple or @EE to bring back call merging.
@EE @Callum93096897 Any Chance Of Reply To My Tweet
@BAFTAGames @EE Pretty sure it's gonna be It Takes Two
Another brilliant day out with @LiteratiTo üëèüèΩ unbelievable how much stuff has been dumped in one small stretch. Brilliant work üíõ @EE https://t.co/VV988YGUyq
@markhwork @O2 @EE Good to know ‚ù§Ô∏è thank you!
@helloimnicholas @O2 @EE @EE are fantastic. Never had an issue and the reception is great. Also they have the fastest 5G of all the networks. I‚Äôve had similar poor experience with @O2
@EE o2 have been terrible since the start of the pandemic.
@EE Have done - thank you

Worst customer service from @O2 today. Pushy salesperson +++. You would have had a customer buying a new apple watch today but seen as though you call me ‚Äòstupid‚Äô for not upgrading my phone (which is a 3 year contract which *you* provide) at same time I‚Äôll think I‚Äôll go see @EE

@EE at least your online chat people don‚Äôt ignore customers, but really!! Because I was told 14 days for delivery, you are actually making me wait until the 14th day to deliver my phone! What a shambles, I think your awards you win are made up üòÇ
@EE Hello !!!!!!!!

@EE
@mattfrei @EE @kevinbacon Join the club!!! I left then years ago and seems there's been no improvement
@EE Need To Speak To Someone Cos I Need To Register My Simcard
@BAFTAGames @EE Still have to check out The Forgotten City!
@EE guys I‚Äôm in Italy right now. Usually based in UK, I wanted to use my data but it‚Äôs not even connecting to the network can you help please?
@EE Sent DM
@connordoner @mattfrei @EE @kevinbacon Peace be with you

Love to see our @EE teams using their volunteering days to play their part in their local communities üí™

Awesome stuff, Brian and team. https://t.co/BolJRQCENL
@EE Can you help me! I suddenly have no signal where I usually have 4 full bars. And when I have signal it‚Äôs 1 bar and very weak!
@EE Perfect! Thank you!!!
@EE It was the normal colour (turquoise) but flashing constantly. After a couple of hours it turned red, then yellow and then constantly the normal colour showing it had come back on.
@Julie_annMurray @mattfrei @EE @kevinbacon I mean, I assumed it wasn‚Äôt obvious, given that most people know little about MVNOs, but go off, I guess?

Some incredible colleagues doing incredible things ‚Äì all while keeping our customers connected.

In fact, our engineers keep everything connected, from the @bt_uk exchanges, data centres and radio sites to the thousands of @EE mobile masts across the UK. https://t.co/FEuym6jE3x
@EE mis-selling is a criminal offence in the UK
@connordoner @mattfrei @EE @kevinbacon Yes that is true thanks for pointing out the obvious...bt must have better customer service i think
@EE beware of ee mis-selling, they promise the world and delivery the moon. be very sure to get a copy of the conversation as they will deny every having had it
@Julie_annMurray @mattfrei @EE @kevinbacon Who, ironically, use EE for their mobile service. üòÇ

@BrightKnight15 @Offcom @Number10press @VodafoneGroup @O2 @EE @ThreeUK Hi there, improving mobile coverage is a priority area for Ofcom. This work is ongoing and you can find further information regarding this in our proposed plan of work for 2022/2023 here: https://t.co/0OP0wziGkk

@mattfrei @86Shyguy @EE @kevinbacon Having also had extremely poor service, incorrect sales and information (as well as an "earworm" from holding on the phone for so long for their so-called customer service) I left @EE a few years ago and would never recommend them.
Anyone else having issues while talking on their mobile phones?  I‚Äôm with EE and someone else is with ID @EE
@EE signal has gone down in my area on 3 of the mobile numbers in the contract
@EE Home broadband - it actually came back on about an hour ago but it was down for about 3 hours.
@mattfrei @EE @kevinbacon Until we start valuing customer service over cheapest price every time we‚Äôll keep on getting shafted by companies.
@EE can someone tell me when my order will be dispached. Just ill need to make sure that someone is in to take the delivery

@mattfrei @EE @kevinbacon Reading this while in a call queue with NatWest for two hours. Waiting now just out of curiosity as to what the agent has to say when I let go of my bottled up thoughts mostly about the most bloody awful music I have ever had to listen to.
@EE Hello! How do I go about claiming my free galaxy airbuds? It's been about 14 days since my phone arrived- do I need to do something to claim? Thanks

@EE quick q. since the S22 ultra is still not expected for a while, will I still be able to claim the galaxy buds since I ordered before the deadline? Or will eligibility for this this go off the delivery date?
@EE Very confused as to why you have closed my complaint case when nothing has been resolved at all.
@EE It keeps saying we can‚Äôt show you extra charges and has done that for two months though there are charges

@wizzair @EE ¬£31.50 and your operative was of no help whatsoever, plus no notification that the call was a premium call. @Ofcom is this acceptable? @ee has rescinded the cost somewhat by issuing a ¬£20 credit however @wizzair this is completely out of order! Helpline‚Ä¶helping whom?
@EE Thanks Tom. Just did that, and it sends me to apple muslic. I sign into my account and still the same. The 6 month offer isnt linked to my account.
@EE Pretty irrelevant if you don‚Äôt live in Leeds

Hi @EE what's the delivery time for the free laptops?

Got my new phone 2 weeks ago just checking the difference for that delivery.

@EE please could someone contact me regarding the return of an upgrade. I have requested the return but keep getting messages about my new plan. Surely the new plan is cancelled if I return the upgrade??

Customer Advisor Role @EE in #Hounslow 

Info/Apply: https://t.co/NQv3ViiZ6v

#WestLondonJobs #RetailJobs https://t.co/HuBbvAWzyd

@EE Want to say a big THANK YOU to Irish Matthew who just helped me sort my phone out before my holiday! He was so friendly and funny, talking to him made the 10 min wait totally worth it! Thanks a bunch Matthew! üòä

@EE Cheers Tom. Last question. The EE website says ‚Äúestimated dispatch within 7 days‚Äù the upgrades team states within 28 days. 

Which is it more likely to be? As I‚Äôll order a different colour if possible to get it sooner
@BenjaminBallA @EE @kevinbacon Good idea
@mattfrei @EE @kevinbacon Happens to us all Matt
@mattfrei @EE @kevinbacon You‚Äôre never far from being let down by a mobile supplier. Isn‚Äôt there a rule, three degrees of Kevin Bacon or something?
@mattfrei @EE @kevinbacon Oh dear...im with bt and they are good!

@mattfrei @EE @kevinbacon I was with their predecessor, T Mobile. They broke promises on my tarrif and when I wanted to leave, did everything they could to prevent me. Seems like a Cultural tradition. In contrast, Tesco Mobile have been first rate.
@mattfrei @EE @kevinbacon Just switch to @giffgaff I‚Äôve never looked back. I agree that EE are an appalling network
@mattfrei @EE @kevinbacon Should of told them you know Jon Snow it might of carried a bit more weight to the argument.
@EE It doesn't seem to be any better, sadly.
@mattfrei @EE @kevinbacon Whatever you‚Äôve bought from them, you usually have 30 days to send it back
@mattfrei @EE @kevinbacon Oh wow, I'm sorry. Take a walk around the office and have a mug of coffee.
@mattfrei @EE @kevinbacon Threaten to leave, this is the only way to get anything sorted with call-centre indifference/incompetence.
@EE any updates on when the s22+ will be in stock? I've been waiting over 2 weeks

Dear @EE I‚Äôve been charged ¬£31 for a phone call to @wizzair last month, it lasted 14 minutes, it was a UK number and at no point was I made aware that exorbitant charges were liable. Any reason why this has happened? Does this sound right to you?
@mattfrei @EE @kevinbacon Money?
@86Shyguy @EE @kevinbacon Too angry to elaborate right now. I would just avoid them at all cost.
@mattfrei @EE @kevinbacon Do you care to elaborate to save others from being trapped in the same way?

Just off the phone with @EE who not only did not apologise for their misleading sales info but have refused outright to find a solution. Appalled @kevinbacon how could you lend your talents to that lot?
@SMARTYMobileUK nothing to say? Looks like I am off to @EE for their stonking 160GB for ¬£20 deal then.

@mikeydee1986 @EE @MartinSLewis Raising bills isn‚Äôt cool ‚Äì especially at a time like this. With us, your prices stay fixed, so you know exactly where you stand. If it‚Äôs fixed prices and peace of mind you‚Äôre after, come jump aboard our trolley. Switch and save now üëç - Laura
COMPANIES; @EE looking at you; please stop cold calling people for 'confirmations'. For people like me who are hearing impaired it's seriously annoying. EMAIL FIRST THEN CALL.
@EE payed half it won‚Äôt let me set up new card until rest due April no option set up card when tried
had to call an american postal company to track something and have been charged ¬£19 for a 5 min call are @EE taking the mick
